text: Mehrdad Mardani (, born 8 22 June) is an Iranian Greco-Roman wrestler. He won bronze medals at the 2018 Asian Games. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1992 births Category:Iranian male sport wrestlers Category:Wrestlers at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games medalists in wrestling Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Iran Category:People from Izeh
title: Mehrdad Mardani
